member.name: M:TradingAPI.MT4Server.OrderClient.OrderSend(System.String,TradingAPI.MT4Server.Op,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.Int32,System.DateTime)
member.summary: The main function used to open a position or place a pending order.
member.param: Maximum price slippage for buy or sell order.
Order comment text. Last part of the comment may be changed by server.
Order magic number. May be used as user defined identifier.
Order expiration time (for pending orders only).
member.exception: Server cannot execute order(instant execution) at specified price. Check exception fields for latest server price.
No reply from server in TradeTimeout milliseconds.

member.name: M:TradingAPI.MT4Server.OrderClient.OrderSendAsync(System.String,TradingAPI.MT4Server.Op,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.Int32,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Send order without awiting reply from server. Use OnOrderProgress event to get result.
member.param: Maximum price slippage for buy or sell order.
Order comment text. Last part of the comment may be changed by server.
Order magic number. May be used as user defined identifier.
Order expiration time (for pending orders only).
member.returns: Temporary ID to identify order until it get a ticket number from server.
